data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Werding, Bernd, Hiller, Alexandra (2007): The Porcellanidae (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura) of the Red Sea with description of a new species of Petrolisthes. Zootaxa 1460: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176386
